Generation V.Black: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
Generation V.White: It does not thrive in dry environments. It keeps itself damp by shooting water stored in its head tuft from its tail.
Generation V.Black 2: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
Generation V.White 2: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.

Generation VI.X: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
Generation VI.Y: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

Generation V.Black: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass ) Received in the Dreamyard (if the player's first partner Pokémon was Snivy )
Generation V.White: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass ) Received in the Dreamyard (if the player's first partner Pokémon was Snivy )
Generation V.Black 2: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass )
